short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Extract e-mail and phone no. from the webpage

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Extract Emails and Contact Numbers present on a website
●	Scrapify is a chrome extension to extract Emails and Contact Numbers present on any website

Features
●	The extension searches all the webpages on a website
●	Extracts emails and contact numbers from the webpages
●	Displays the results in a new tab
●	Results can be exported in a .CSV file and can be downloaded
●	Download button is displayed in the new tab containing the results
